title: New: Lucy Camp – Down Talk EP
body: **Lucy Camp’s** Burial sampling Sixteen surfaced earlier this year, and has been firmly stuck in my playlists ever since. With the release of her latest EP, **_Down Talk_**, she presents herself as both a potential pop-star and cultural game changer. Combining witty, cutting lyricism with a delivery that rivals pretty much any emcee around right now – it’s thoroughly addictive. Check it below. Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly. Down Talk \[EP\] by Lucy Camp Down Talk \[EP\] by Lucy Camp Down Talk \[EP\] by Lucy Camp Down Talk \[EP\] by Lucy Camp
